welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Lebanon, where the charm of small town life meets the beauty of the United States. Discover our rich history, friendly locals, and breathtaking scenery as you explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lancaster Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Harrisburg International Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for regional flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Municipalcipal/Spaatz Field Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight operations at the airport, including shipping and receiving of goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Capital City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Capital City Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at York Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at York Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
